Solar Info Bridge
info:
**Solar Info Bridge (SIB)**

Purpose
Get Solar Data from Home Assistant Production

Fetch every minute the data using HTTP RESTful request:
http://user:password@ha-ip:1880/endpoint/solarinfo?data=all

Parse the CSV string received.
6852, 0, 6252, 600, 0, 0, 100, 20250619, 932.
CSV format: 9 comma-separated values
"powerfromsolar", "powerfromgrid", "powertogrid", "powertohouse", 
"powertobattery", "powerfrombattery", "batterychargestate", 
"powerdatestamp", "powertimestamp"

Publish the data to MQTT:
| MQTT Topic                                             | Payload  |
| ------------------------------------------------------ | -------- |
| homeassistant/sensor/power_from_solar/state            | 2381     |
| homeassistant/sensor/power_from_grid/state             | 0        |
| homeassistant/sensor/power_to_grid/state               | 2194     |
| homeassistant/sensor/power_to_house/state              | 187      |
| homeassistant/sensor/power_to_battery/state            | 0        |
| homeassistant/sensor/power_from_battery/state          | 0        |
| homeassistant/sensor/power_battery_charge/state        | 100      |
| homeassistant/sensor/power_datestamp/state             | 20250619 |
| homeassistant/sensor/power_timestamp/state             | 957      |

Single Topic with JSON Payload
{"powerfromsolar":2291,"powerfromgrid":0,"powertogrid":2077,"powertohouse":214,"powertobattery":0,"powerfrombattery":0,"batterychargestate":100,"powerdatestamp":"20250619","powertimestamp":"1331"}
